questions.text: George misses Susan in the beginning of the episode.
questions.explanation:
True.

	When George talks about how depressed and lonely he is, Jerry suggests that he go see Elaine's therapist, Dana Foley.  George ends up going although he still contemplates calling Susan a few times.  Jerry tells George to leave because he's being too dramatic.  By the end of the episode, George meets up with Susan at Monk's Restaurant.

On a plane.

	Jerry met Tia in the previous episode, "The Airport", when they were seated next to each other in first-class on a flight to JFK.  Jerry recently received a Christmas card from Tia and Elaine points it out.  Jerry says they're going out on Friday night.

questions.text: Who takes Elaine's Christmas card picture?
questions.explanation:
Kramer.

	Elaine is hesitant about taking her picture at first, but Jerry backs Kramer up and recommends that she get her picture taken for a Christmas card.  Although they don't notice it at first, Kramer and Elaine make the card with a picture that shows Elaine's nipple.

questions.text: What is the name of the perfume that Jerry's girlfriend is wearing?
questions.explanation:
Ocean & The Ocean.

	In the third season episode, "The Pez Dispenser", Kramer met with an executive from Calvin Klein in order to have them create cologne that smells like the beach.  Immediately after smelling Tia's perfume, Kramer realizes that they stole his idea.  Tia is modeling the perfume in a magazine.

questions.text: What happens to George's jacket during his time with the therapist?
questions.explanation:
The zipper gets caught.

	George can't focus on his session with the therapist because he only cares about the zipper.  He tries to pull the jacket over his head, but it won't come off.  He ends up getting nowhere with the therapist.

questions.text: Who is the first to see Elaine's Christmas card and point out its flaw?
questions.explanation:
Jerry.

	Jerry ends up seeing the card, and he finds out that Elaine's nipple was showing in the picture.  Elaine explains that she sent the card to hundreds of people including her nephew, her grandparents, and her boyfriend.

questions.text: Where did Jerry scratch his nose?
questions.explanation:
In his car.

	Although he was scratching his nose, Tia saw him from a cab and she thought that he was picking his nose.  For the rest of the episode, Tia doesn't return Jerry's calls because she thinks that the 'scratch' was a 'pick'.

questions.text: What is Elaine's new nickname at work?
questions.explanation:
Nip.

	Elaine's card ends up plastered around her office and the people at work are calling her Nip because of the picture.  At this point, her boyfriend, Fred, hasn't called her in three days.

questions.text: What is the name of Elaine's sister?
questions.explanation:
Gail.

	Gail is mentioned in the previous episode, "The Airport", as well as in this episode.  Her sister called regarding the card sent to her nephew.  Elaine also ends up arguing with her boyfriend over the card because he thought that it was intended that she sent out the cards with her nipple showing.

questions.text: Does Newman appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Jerry calls Newman to his apartment in order to see if he notices Elaine's nipple in the card.  In the end of the episode, Kramer ends up modeling for Calvin Klein, George uses 'the pick' to get away from Susan, and Jerry gets a hold of Tia who's disgusted with him.
